snippet: Max Schrems's crusade against the information collected by the social network has become a cause celebre in parts of Europe, looming over the company as it prepares to go public.
abstract: Max Schrems's crusade against the information collected by the social network has become a cause celebre in parts of Europe, looming over the company as it prepares to go public.

headline.main: An Austrian Law Student Faces Down Facebook
